document.full_text: time warner cable and viacom inc on thursday countersued each other in an escalating battle over whether cable companies have the right to distribute tv shows to devices like apple inc's ipad tablet.
document.title: time warner cable, viacom sue each other over ipad tv
lines_and_colors: time warner cable and viacom inc on thursday countersued each other in an escalating battle over whether cable companies have the right to distribute tv shows to devices like apple inc's ipad tablet.
